      • activateFinalFrenzy

        public void activateFinalFrenzy(int activePlayer)
        this method builds the actiontile Frenzy objects for each player and the method checks and sends the right amount of frenzy actions to the constructor.
        Parameters:
        activePlayer - is the player that has to play the first frenzy turn (sent by the controller)
